review: Dilaudid (hydromorphone):I take Dilaudid for severe chronic migraines, for which it is a godsend. I have now developed acute bronchitis (I assume), related to a recent chest cold. The Dilaudid has really calmed my incessant hacking, and also helps any accompanying headache. I'm also taking ibuprofen, acetaminophen, and antihistamines regularly, which seems to help. I guess time is the only real cure â€” ugh!
Dilaudid (hydromorphone):Stopped dry hacking cough, have used it once but found Drs don't write for this medicine.
